titles.title: A bill to temporarily suspend the duty on 2-(alpha-hydroxyethyl)-3-amino-1, 5-pentane-dioic acid 5-methylester.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 8/10/1988--Introduced. Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1991, the duty on 2-(alpha-hydroxyethyl)-3-amino-1,5-pentane-diodic acid 5-methylester.
